news.title: MIDC plans to acquire over 600-acre land near Nashik
news.para: After setting up a new industrial estate at Talegaon-Akrale in Dindori on 650 acres, the Maharashtra Industrial Development Corporation (MIDC) has identified around 650 acres at Sinnar and near Rajur Bahula, around 15 km from Nashik city, for industries.

news.title: No conversion of paddy land bought after 2008 law: Kerala high court
news.para: The full bench comprising Chief Justice S Manikumar and Justice Shaji P Chaly and Justice Sathish Ninan declared that a 2019 judgment of a division bench (Yousuf Chalil vs State of Kerala) that allowed reclamation of paddy land by a subsequent purchaser to build a house was incorrect law.

news.title: House-owners in suburb Tellapur pay more tax than Hyderabad civic body residents
news.para: For the same building in municipal corporations such as Boduppal or Nizampet, the tax is very high. However, the tax is much lower in other parts of the city like Serilingampally circle in GHMC, where it is Rs 12,000 a year.

news.title: Nagpur civic body inks pact with Ramky Enviro for C&D waste reuse
news.para: The NMC on Friday signed an agreement with Hyderabad’s Ramky Enviro Engineers Limited to implement the project. As per the plan, collection and reuse of 150-200 metric tonne (MT) C&D daily will keep the city clean and also convert the waste into wealth.

news.title: All unauthorised colonies in Delhi to get water, drainage by March 2023
news.para: Deputy CM Manish Sisodia and water minister Satyendar Jain were also present in the meeting. Kejriwal directed the officials that all construction work going on in unauthorised colonies should be of the best quality and all basic facilities should be provided to the residents without any hassles.

news.title: Maharashtra construction workers' board accepts 9.9 lakh registration applications
news.para: ​However, lack of documents, migration of workers, and 90-day work certificate have posed hurdles in the registration process, said S Rangam, secretary-cum-CEO of the board.

news.title: Kolhapur civic body to use GIS, AI for property survey & assessment
news.para: The KMC will use advanced technology, as it has repeatedly failed to conduct a survey of the properties. Every year, a large number of properties have come up in the city. However, most of them are not included in the civic body’s property tax net.

news.title: Bidhannagar civic body plans to impose 10% penalty on property tax dues
news.para: Mayor Krishna Chakraborty in her budget speech said that there was a general apathy towards payment of tax in the absence of any penal action. Presently, there is no system to impose penalty and interest for delayed or non-payment of tax.

news.title: Hyderabad civic body introduces new system to assess property tax
news.para: The GHMC admitted that the existing property tax system was not citizen-friendly and said people were forced to visit zonal offices multiple times to get their assessments done.

news.title: Gurugram authorities seek to corroborate IIT-Delhi findings on Chintels Paradiso
news.para: The IIT Delhi in its report found that the collapsed building was "aging faster than expected" and had significant corrosion in its steel reinforcement.

news.title: Bombay HC orders Omkar Realtors to make Worli flat habitable within seven days
news.para: S P Kapadia and his wife had bought the 65th-floor apartment in ‘Worli 1973’ for Rs 23 crore in 2015 and completed payment in 2017. The HC also directed the builder to finish three private lifts for the flat in Tower A in three months.

news.title: In troubled waters, challenges get taller for Noida's realty sector
news.para: The UP-Rera website shows there are more than 70 projects across the state that have ended up at the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT) for insolvency proceedings.

news.title: Give us refund at the earliest: NBCC Green View residents meet DC
news.para: At the meeting, they urged the DC to get an FIR registered against the developer for endangering their lives and demanded that the state-owned construction firm be blacklisted for all future projects in Gurgaon.

news.title: Bombay HC grants bail to Avantha Group's promoter in Yes Bank fraud case
news.para: The CBI had registered an offence against Thapar, Yes Bank founder Rana Kapoor and other accused under sections 120B (criminal conspiracy), 420 (cheating) of the Indian Penal Code (IPC) and sections 7, 11 and 12 of the Prevention of Corruption Act (PCA).

news.title: Sunteck Realty case: Sebi reduces penalties on five entities
news.para: ​The total penalty imposed on five entities is lower than the amount slapped on them through an order passed in December 2019.
